item.title: ✘ Carion - We're the Best ✘ Grand Exchange ✘ Pest Control ✘ Auto Voting ✘
item.dc:creator: @entrinthy_rs entrinthy rs
item.description:
@entrinthy_rs wrote:

Updates

[ul][li]Fixed resting & running.
Fixed prayer, it’ll now work.
Added Monk’s clothes into the game.
Fixed some button issues.
[/li]
[li][/li][/ul]

Transportation

[ul][li]Removed the Spirit Tree.
Moved the teleports to the quest tab.
Added Frost Dungeon, ::frosts.
Moved altars to ::altars[/li]
[li][/li][/ul]
.

Oracle of Carion

[ul][li]Cannon’s has been added.
Dominion Store, has been added[/li]
[li][/li][/ul]
.

Read full topic
item.source: ✘ Carion - We're the Best ✘ Grand Exchange ✘ Pest Control ✘ Auto Voting ✘

item.title: ✘ Carion - We're the Best ✘ Grand Exchange ✘ Pest Control ✘ Auto Voting ✘
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

[quote=“entrinthy rs, post:8, topic:550755”][quote author=Soulcist link=topic=669664.msg4478456#msg4478456 date=1427787431]
This thread shows nothing of interesting value for people to look at and then experience a little of it without evening coming on the server. I know for a fact that a lot of people are not going to wait for the cache to download and log on just to find out that they actually don’t like it. You should add media that would attract people to the server.

Anyway, the forum looks pretty nice to see with a decent homepage that’s simple and to the point which is fine. I do like the theme though, it’s pretty good - nice job.
[/quote]

You’re right bud. I’ll try adding more enjoyable features.
Thanks for your positive feedback, by the way,[/quote]

How long is it going to take for you to add media?

Read full topic

item.title: ✘ Carion - We're the Best ✘ Grand Exchange ✘ Pest Control ✘ Auto Voting ✘
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

This thread shows nothing of interesting value for people to look at and then experience a little of it without evening coming on the server. I know for a fact that a lot of people are not going to wait for the cache to download and log on just to find out that they actually don’t like it. You should add media that would attract people to the server.

Anyway, the forum looks pretty nice to see with a decent homepage that’s simple and to the point which is fine. I do like the theme though, it’s pretty good - nice job.

Read full topic
